issue.title: [C++] Implement hash_aggregate mean/stdev/variance kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13295](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13295). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have scalar aggregate kernels for these already that can serve as the basis for a hash aggregate implementation.

Depends on ARROW-12759 as that refactors  how hash aggregate kernels are implemented.
